long_description: With a flattering fit and comfortable 4-way stretch, the REI Northway plus-size dress is perfect for traveling. Easy-care polyester is blended with elastane for the perfect fit and drape. Tapered trim and feminine tucking at V-neckline. Concealed zip security pocket at left front waistband to stash a key or credit card. REI Northway dress has a classic fit.
short_description: With a flattering fit and comfortable 4-way stretch, the REI Northway plus-size dress is perfect for traveling. Easy-care polyester is blended with elastane for the perfect fit and drape.
